Package jdbm

Simplified public API corresponding to GDBM APIs.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RecordManager An interface to manages records, which are uninterpreted blobs of data.
RecordManagerProvider Provider of RecordManager implementation.
 

Class Summary
RecordManagerFactory This is the factory class to use for instantiating RecordManager instances.
RecordManagerOptions Standard options for RecordManager.
 

Package jdbm Description

Simplified public API corresponding to GDBM APIs.

JDBM

JDBM is a simple transactional persistent engine for Java. It aims to be for Java what GDBM is for C/C++, Perl, Python, etc: a fast, simple persistence engine.

You can use it to store a mix of hashtables and blobs, and all updates are done in a transactionally safe manner.
